sentences_texts: This laptop has only 2 USB ports, and they are both on the same side.
This thing is awesome, everything always works, everything is always easy to set up, everything is compatible, its literally everything I could ask for.
the hardware problems have been so bad, i can't wait till it completely dies in 3 years, TOPS!
HOWEVER I chose two day shipping and it took over a week to arrive.
The memory was gone and it was not able to be used.
The SD card reader is slightly recessed and upside down (the nail slot on the card cannot be accessed), if this was a self ejecting slot this would not be an issue, but its not.
sentences_opinions: SD card reader negative <sep> nail slot on the card negative <sep> slot negative

sentences_texts: I was a little concerned about the touch pad based on reviews, but I've found it fine to work with.
Wasn't sure if I was going to like it much less love it so I went to a local best buy and played around with the IOS system on a Mac Pro and it was totally unique and different.
